Meso.variable_list()¶

class MesoPy.Meso(api_token)¶
variable_list()¶

Returns in JSON format a list of variables that could be obtained from the ‘vars’ param in other functions. Some stations may not record all variables listed. Use the station_list function to return metadata on each station.

Args:
None
Returns:
dictionary of station variables

Previous topic

Meso.precipitation_obs()

Next topic

Meso.station_list()
